title: iRobot Verro® 500 PowerScrub Pool Cleaning Robot
description:
Learn more about home robots: http://www.irobot.com/youtube/home_robots

The Verro 500 PowerScrub cleans in-ground pools, floor to waterline, in 3 hours.
